semantic_roles.sentence: In last month's issue of Edge magazine, company President Sohei Niikawa discussed how Disgaea 5 was "practically" a launch title for the Switch and once again spoke about the strong sales on the system in both Japan and the west:

object.text: how Disgaea 5 was "practically" a launch title for the Switch

semantic_roles.sentence: In last month's issue of Edge magazine, company President Sohei Niikawa discussed how Disgaea 5 was "practically" a launch title for the Switch and once again spoke about the strong sales on the system in both Japan and the west:
It’s true: Disgaea 5 was practically a launch title for the Switch.
That had a huge positive effect for us.

object.text: a huge positive effect for us

semantic_roles.sentence: Releasing the company’s flagship title, even if it was a port, for Nintendo’s flagship hardware close to launch was a boon for us; it sold incredibly well both in Japan and abroad.

object.text: how Nintendo had been exceptionally supportive

semantic_roles.sentence: The Switch is the ideal piece of hardware.

The Switch closes this gap, by meeting the needs of both audiences.

Picture: Richard Jupe Water Sports Comanche lands early hit for Boxing Day by AMANDA LULHAM 0 SYDNEY to Hobart defending champion Comanche has ­produced a morale-boosting victory over her supermaxi rival Wild Oats in a major shakedown before the Boxing Day race south.
Skipper Jim Cooney and his team defeated Mark Richards and his crew on Wild Oats XI for the line honours victory in the annual Cabbage Tree ­Island race on the weekend.
The third supermaxi in the race, the Mark Bradford-skippered Black Jack, retired due to a crew injury.

"We've been sailing a lot, putting in the work - weeks on end," Cooney said.

relations.sentence: Nippon Ichi's president on Disgaea 5 Complete's Switch success, says the Switch is 'the ideal piece of hardware'
Nippon Ichi's president on Disgaea 5 Complete's Switch success, says the Switch is 'the ideal piece of hardware'
Nippon Ichi's president on Disgaea 5 Complete's Switch success, says the Switch is 'the ideal piece of hardware'

results.text: The final point to make is that, for Nippon Ichi, at least, the Switch is the ideal piece of hardware.

semantic_roles.sentence: This month's issue of EDGE features an interview with Nippon Ichi president Sohei Niikawa.
In the interview, Niikawa talks about Disgaea 5 Complete’s Switch success, Nintendo's relationship with Nippon Ichi, and the Switch in general.

object.text: about Disgaea 5 Complete’s Switch success, Nintendo's relationship with Nippon Ichi, and the Switch in general

semantic_roles.sentence: Niikawa’s full words:
“It’s true: Disgaea 5 was practically a launch title for the Switch.
That had a huge positive effect for us.

object.text: a huge positive effect for us

semantic_roles.sentence: Releasing the company’s flagship title, even if it was a port, for Nintendo’s flagship hardware close to launch was a boon for us; it sold incredibly well both in Japan and abroad.

subject.text: Nintendo’s flagship hardware close to launch

semantic_roles.sentence: Releasing the company’s flagship title, even if it was a port, for Nintendo’s flagship hardware close to launch was a boon for us; it sold incredibly well both in Japan and abroad.
Releasing the company’s flagship title, even if it was a port, for Nintendo’s flagship hardware close to launch was a boon for us; it sold incredibly well both in Japan and abroad.

object.text: incredibly well both in Japan and abroad

semantic_roles.sentence: It’s important to note that Nintendo was extremely supportive.

object.text: important to note that Nintendo was extremely supportive

semantic_roles.sentence: They came to Gifu several times to teach us in person about the hardware and its ins and outs.

object.text: in person about the hardware and its ins and outs

semantic_roles.sentence: I am incredibly grateful to Nintendo, this giant of the industry, for coming out to the middle of nowhere to support us.

object.text: incredibly grateful to Nintendo, this giant of the industry, for coming out to the middle of nowhere to support us

semantic_roles.sentence: The final point to make is that, for Nippon Ichi, at least, the Switch is the ideal piece of hardware.
Right now, in Western territories, non-handheld software is what sells.
Right now, in Western territories, non-handheld software is what sells.
This has created an issue in the past for developers, a gap between Japanese playing habits and those found in the rest of the world.
This has created an issue in the past for developers, a gap between Japanese playing habits and those found in the rest of the world.
This has created an issue in the past for developers, a gap between Japanese playing habits and those found in the rest of the world.
The Switch closes this gap, by meeting the needs of both audiences.
So we worked hard to be there right at the beginning.
So we worked hard to be there right at the beginning.
And it’s working out for us.”
